section.title: Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.Installations.Models.TryRegisterViewModelArgs Class Reference

listitem.para: TryRegisterViewModelArgs (Key< TextEditorViewModel > viewModelKey, ResourceUri resourceUri, Category category, bool shouldSetFocusToEditor, IServiceProvider serviceProvider)

One can use Key<T>.NewKey() if they have no preference for the key value. The identifier for the view model which is used by most of the API in TextEditors.Models.TextEditorServices.ITextEditorService.
The unique identifier for the TextEditorModel which is providing the underlying data to be rendered by this view model.
When this view model next gets rendered should browser focus be set to the text editor.
